intro:
Marblelous Animals is a fun and cute adventure in which you'll be in charge of leading these chubby animals to their home. 

CHARACTERISTICS:

- Get as many coins and diamonds as possible and collect all animals and learn some fun facts about them!

- Face dangers in your journey through the African continent: 

Spears
Sprints
Sharp cacti
Holes
Moving platforms
Jumping craters

- Turn your Nintendo Switch to move your animal. It's simple, it's easy, it's fun!!! 

- Win 40 levels to reach your goal and get home! 

- Tutorials will be at your disposal if you need them

Join us and save ours round animals!
